com.netflix.nfgraph.util

Class ByteArrayReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.nfgraph.util.ByteArrayReader

  • public class ByteArrayReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Used by the NFCompressedGraph, and various OrdinalSet and OrdinalIterator implementations to read the encoded graph data.

    It is unlikely that this class will be required externally.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ByteArrayReader(byte[] data, int pointer)

    • Method Detail

      • getByte

        public byte getByte(int offset)
        Returns:
        the byte value at the given offset.

      • setPointer

        public void setPointer(int pointer)
        Set the current offset of this reader.

      • skip

        public void skip(int numBytes)
        Increment the current offset of this reader by numBytes.

      • readVInt

        public int readVInt()
        Returns:
        a variable-byte integer at the current offset. The offset is incremented by the size of the returned integer.

      • readByte

        public byte readByte()
        Returns:
        the byte at the current offset. The offset is incremented by one.

      • setRemainingBytes

        public void setRemainingBytes(int remainingBytes)
        Sets the start byte of this reader to the current offset, then sets the end byte to the current offset + remainingBytes

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Sets the current offset of this reader to the start byte.

      • length

        public int length()
        Returns:
        the length of this reader.

      • copy

        public ByteArrayReader copy()
        Returns:
        a copy of this reader. The copy will have the same underlying byte array, start byte, and end byte, but the current offset will be equal to the start byte.
